task_description:
# Basic Template Marketplace

Pre-configured templates for common ML workloads: Jupyter Lab, Stable Diffusion WebUI, ComfyUI, vLLM inference server. One-click deployment with all dependencies configured.

## Rationale
Addresses pain point of complex GPU environment setup. Vast.ai requires manual CUDA/driver configuration. Templates reduce time-to-first-value from hours to minutes.

## User Stories
- As an AI artist, I want to deploy Stable Diffusion with one click so that I can start generating images immediately
- As a developer, I want pre-configured Jupyter Lab so that I don't waste time setting up CUDA and drivers

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] At least 4 official templates available: Jupyter, Stable Diffusion, ComfyUI, vLLM
- [ ] One-click deployment from dashboard
- [ ] Templates include optimal GPU recommendations
- [ ] Each template has documentation and getting-started guide
- [ ] Templates boot in under 2 minutes
